scripts.build: spago build && echo Ctrl-f5 your browser if non-purescript changes were made!
scripts.serve: npm run build && parcel serve index.html
scripts.release: rm -rf docs && npm run build && parcel build ./index.html --dist-dir docs/ --public-url replacethiswithadot && sed -i 's/replacethiswithadot/./g' docs/index.html && git checkout -- docs/CNAME
scripts.publish: npm run release && git add . && git commit -m publish
